original_text: His people will come back to Mount Zion, and they will shout with joy. They will be very happy because of all the good things that the Lord gives to them. There will be grain to make bread, new wine and olive oil. There will be lambs and young cows. They will grow and be strong, like a garden that has plenty of water. They will not be weak or sad any more. His people will come back to Mount Zion, and they will shout with joy. They will be very happy because of all the good things that the Lord gives to them. There will be grain to make bread, new wine and olive oil. There will be lambs and young cows. They will grow and be strong, like a garden that has plenty of water. They will not be weak or sad any more. His people will come back to Mount Zion, and they will shout with joy. They will be very happy because of all the good things that the Lord gives to them. There will be grain to make bread, new wine and olive oil. There will be lambs and young cows. They will grow and be strong, like a garden that has plenty of water. They will not be weak or sad any more. His people will come back to Mount Zion,
korean_text: 그들이 와서 시온의 높은 곳에서 찬송하며 여호와의 복 곧 곡식과 새 포도주와 기름과 어린 양의 떼와 소의 떼를 얻고 크게 기뻐하리라 그 심령은 물 댄 동산 같겠고 다시는 근심이 없으리로다 할지어다

sentences.original_text: His people will come back to Mount Zion
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 백성들이 시온 산으로 돌아올 것입니다

because of all the good things
that the Lord gives to them

There will be lambs and young cows
